summary: The internet has made it easier for sex traffickers to exploit victims and connect with buyers. Traffickers often use social media and these 3 types of platforms: Advertising (classified ad sites for sex services) "Hobby board" (review sites for sex services) "Sugar dating" (dating sites that include commercial arrangements) In 2018, Congress passed a law to hold online platform providers accountable for prostitution and trafficking...
title: Sex Trafficking: Online Platforms and Federal Prosecutions
